text: Robert Gray (born 8 June 1953) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played for Nottingham Forest, Workington, Airdrie, Blantyre Victoria, Stirling Albion, Alloa Athletic and Albion Rovers, as a midfielder. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players Category:Workington A.F.C. players Category:Airdrieonians F.C. title: Robert Gray (footballer, born 1953)
